column1: We are Cows, proud and true! Come on, South Park, moo moo moo! Goooo Cows!

Yeah yeah, do we rock?!
Yeah yeah, take it to the top!
Yeah yeah, are we gonna stop?!
No way! No way!

Yeah yeah, do we rock?!
Yeah yeah, take it to the top!
Yeah yeah, are we gonna stop?!
No way! No way!

Who are you yelling for? South Park! Let's go Cows!
Who are you yelling for? South Park! Let's go Cows!
We are South Park, Green and White. Let's go, Cows! Fight, fight, fight! Nobody can beat a Cow! Let's gooo, South Park!
